data.caption: Results - Financial Results For December 31, 2022.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 & 33 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 read with Para A of Part A of Schedule Ill of the SEBI Listing Regulations, the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e., February 06, 2023, we enclose herewith the Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2022 along with Limited Review Report on the said Un-audited Financial Results duly issued by M/s. Singhi & Co., Chartered Accountants, the Statutory Auditors of the Company.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Of Praxis Home Retail Limited Held On Monday, February 06, 2023
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 & 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosures Requirements) Regulations, 2015 [SEBI
Listing Regulations] read with Para A of Part A of Schedule Ill of the SEBI Listing Regulations, the Board of Directors of
the Company at their meeting held today i.e., February 06, 2023, we enclose herewith the Un-audited Financial Results
for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2022 along with Limited Review Report on the said Un-audited
Financial Results duly issued by M/s. Singhi & Co., Chartered Accountants, the Statutory Auditors of the Company.
These un-audited financial results have been reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors at its meeting held today.
The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 11 :50 AM and concluded at 12:24 PM. The above is for your
information and record.
